resources.string: Battery optimization disabled. To enable it go to device settings
Clear cache\nClear all local data. This can free up some space.
Do you really want to remove chat history and other local data?\nAccount and roster data are not affected. The app will close.
Send on Enter\nMessage can be sent by pressing the Enter button
Auto-away\nAutomatically set away status on screen lock
Group by account\nGroup contacts in contact list by account
Active chats on top\nDisplay active chats at the top of the contact list
Show avatars\nShows users\' avatars in contact list
Show messages\nShows users\' messages in contact list
Show empty groups\nShow groups with no online contacts
Show groups\nShow groups in contact list
Show accounts panel\nShow action buttons with avatars in the bottom right corner of contact list
Duplicate active chats\nActive chats appear both on top of contact list and in groups
Debug log\nWrite messages to debug log (please restart application to apply changes)
Write file log\nWrite debug log to local file (you can share it).
Log files\nList of written log files.
Download all messages from archive\nDebug function. May works with errors
Show connection errors\nDisplay connection exceptions pop-ups
Share crash and diagnostics data\nHelp app developers improve Xabber by allowing to share crash and diagnostics data with them (please restart application to apply changes).
Xabber gathers anonymous bug reports. You may disable it in debug settings, but it will hinder our ability to provide reliable messaging experience to Xabber users.
Light indication\nBlink LED on notification from conferences
Taskbar icon\nShow persistent notification. This option prevents Android from unloading the app from memory
Debug settings\nSettings to help developers improve Xabber
Messages only from roster. Auth requests only with captcha
Messages only from roster. No auth requests
Message delivery receipts\nSend and receive message delivery receipts
Avatars in messages\nShow avatars in each message
Send typing notifications\nNotify the other user that you are typing a message to them
Adjust priority\nSet priority according to selected status. Account priority will be overridden.
"Extended away" when idle\nSet "Extended away" on screen lock
Start when Android boots\nStart the application when Android boots. This doesn\'t work when Xabber is installed on SD card.
Prevent sleep mode\nPrevent the device from sleeping. This will increase battery usage.
Keep WiFi awake\nKeep WiFi active on standby. This will increase battery usage
Reset offline settings\nClear individual settings for groups and accounts
Do you really want to clear individual settings for groups and accounts?
Alert on first message\nNotify only on the first message in a chat
Ignore system vibration settings\nUse this option if system vibration does not work
Message preview\nShow message text from chats in notification area
Message preview\nShow message text from conferences in notification area
Notify in current chat\nNotify on incoming messages in current chat
Suppress some status messages\nDon\'t get \'This room is not anonymous\' messages
%s (you won\'t receive messages from any chat)
Check server certificate\nNotify for certificate problems on encrypted connections
Remove certificates\nClear list of ignored certificates
Store history\nStore chat history for OTR sessions
Load vCard\nLoad and update contact\'s personal info and avatar. Disable to reduce traffic usage.
Load images\nLoad images from file URL automatically. Disable to reduce traffic usage.
Carbon-copied mode\nWill share sessions for the same account on this client. Disable to reduce traffic usage.
Plain text auth\nUse plain text authentication for all accounts. Not recommended.
Key phrases\nCreate custom notifications for received messages that contain specific phrases
Do you really want to remove all ignored certificates?
Alert about new messages in chats
Alert about new messages in conferences
Play sounds on message in another chat
Vibrate on message in another chat
Show preview on message in another chat
Play sound on message in current chat
All notification settings would be set to default values
